annotations.description: The Switchblade was created by Nashville bartender Riley Perrin who plies her trade at Attaboy (In East Nashville). Attaboy is owned by Milk & Honey Alum Sam...
annotations.title: Some Folks Call It A Switchblade

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Blanco Tequila
.5oz (15ml) White Creme De Cacao
.75oz (22.5ml) Lime Juice
.25oz (7.5ml) Simple Syrup
Cayenne Pepper Garnish

Shake and strain into coup

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DnZ2RZDYTzI
title: Switchblade
